Scarlett Moffatt has shared the heartbreaking moment she decided to lose weight. 
Opening up on This Morning , the I'm A Celebrity queen revealed that she went to see her GP as she was suffering with back pain and her energy levels had plummeted. 
The doctor then told her that her symptoms were due to obesity. 
"It was hard for me, going home and explaining to my mum and dad why I went to the doctors and what was wrong with me," she said. Scarlett Moffatt has shared the heartbreaking moment she decided to lose weight (Photo: ITV) 
"They also tested my for diabetes type 2 because they said I could be pre-diabetic, and I was like 'Oh my gosh, I’m 25, I don’t understand how I’ve got to this’..." 
Scarlett was then inspired to change her life, get fit and make a DVD detailing her every step. Opening up on This Morning, the I'm A Celebrity queen revealed that she went to see her GP as she was suffering with back pain and her energy levels had plummeted (Photo: ITV) Scarlett was shocked to learn her symptoms were due to obesity (Photo: ITV) 
But it wasn't an easy journey. In a sneak preview from the DVD, the star can be seen at the start of her journey getting weighed. 
When she finds out she weighs 11 stone 5lbs, she bursts into tears. 
"I would just say to anyone starting out [losing weight and getting healthy], just focus on the positives," Scarlett added. The star burst into tears when she found out she weighed 11 stone 5lbs (Photo: FameFlynet.uk.com) 
"Just think, it [the weight] can’t get any higher if I put the work in. I’m not going to lie, it is hard, anyone who says it’s easy is lying, and this is only an hour out of my day. I hate gyms, I feel really intimidated by gyms, and everyone knows how much I like being in my front room!” 
Scalrett is currently in a relationship with boyfriend Luke Crodden, who has been very supportive to her during the weight-loss process. Scarlett has released a fitness DVD detailing her weight-loss journey (Photo: ITV) 
"He was with me when I was at my biggest," the Gogglebox star added. "He said to me, 'You’re just like an iphone, you’re all the same on the inside but that I keep getting an upgrade every now and then, you’ve got added features' - I was like, ‘thanks, I think!’..."
